text: The only real failure is the failure to try, and the measure of success is how we cope with disappointment.
Mistakes are the growing pains of wisdom.
Failure is not falling down but refusing to get up.
Experience is a hard teacher because she gives the test first, the lesson afterward.
The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
All things are difficult before they are easy.
A clay pot sitting in the sun will always be a clay pot. It has to go through the fire to become porcelain.

If there is light in the soul, there will be beauty in the person. If there is beauty in the person, there will be harmony in the house. If there is harmony in the house, there will be order in the nation. If there is order in the nation, there will be peace in the world.
Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without.
The superior man is modest in his speech, but exceeds in his actions.
Harmony is the greatest treasure.
If there is light in the soul, there will be beauty in the person. If there is beauty in the person, there will be harmony in the house.
Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.
A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step... and a lot of complaining.
The person who says it cannot be done should not interrupt the person doing it.
He who asks a question is a fool for five minutes; he who does not ask remains a fool forever.
Prepare the umbrella before it rains, not after you're already wet.
He who knows does not speak. He who speaks does not know... unless they're a politician.
A good traveler has no fixed plans and is not intent on arriving. A lost traveler says the same thing.
Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated. Then we complain about the complications.
One generation plants the trees; another gets the shade. The third generation cuts them down for paper.
Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn. Bore me and I'll pretend to listen.
The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones. The woman who directs him often accomplishes more.
In prosperity our friends know us; in adversity we know our friends.
Friendship is like earthenware; once broken, it can be mended. Love is like porcelain; once broken, it is broken forever.
True friendship comes when the silence between two people is comfortable. False friendship is recognized when one friend won't stop talking about themselves.
The man of wisdom is never of two minds; the man of benevolence never worries; the man of courage is never afraid.
The superior man is modest in his speech, but exceeds in his actions.
Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
One who is content with what they have is truly rich.
The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
千里之行，始于足下 (Qiān lǐ zhī xíng, shǐ yú zú xià - A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step)
Know yourself and you will win all battles.
source: Sun Tzu, The Art of War

text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
